name: Greek Orthodox Priests Freezed
description:
Paphian Priests early 20th century
pixels 1811x2500 - 200dpi
I am the owner of one of the biggest glass plate negatives collections in the world. I have been fortunate to inherit it from my great uncle. Professional Photographer (1901-1991). The collection though was stored for approximately 40 years in a very dumb environment. As a result that all glass plate negatives have been affected by humidity. You can find out more about the collection on my website https://www.sergisadamos.com/about-metamorphosis-art-exhibition-2019 
When I started scanning the collection I was amazed at the images that were revealed. As an artist, digital artist, discovering such work, in its unique condition, I felt blessed and from then I could not stop wondering how to interact with this new material.
The specific image presented to you here is part of my experiments that have been going on since I first discovered them. You can see three local Greek Orthodox priests, early 20th century, posing for an annual picture. 
I combined the deteriorated patterns, caused by humidity, with the priests, by adding colors, allowing to unite the whole composition together, seeking to be evaluated in a new contemporary context.
